titles.title: Generating Opportunity by Forgiving Educational Debt for Service Act of 2003
A bill to amend the internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income amounts paid on behalf of Federal employees under Federal student loan repayment programs.
Generating Opportunity by Forgiving Educational Debt for Service Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: Generating Opportunity by Forgiving Educational Debt for Service Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to exclude: (1) from the gross income of a Federal employee amounts the Federal Government repays on the employee's student loans; and (2) such payments from counting as wages for the calculation of Social Security taxes.
